brand_identity.name: ColdIQ
brand_identity.mission: Turn cold emails into warm conversations with surgical AI precision.
brand_identity.emotional_tone: Surgical, High-Tech, Trustworthy, Efficient, 'Control Room' vibe.
brand_identity.visual_style: Dark Mode, Neon Accents, Glassmorphism, Data-Dense.

headings.usage: All section headers, hero titles, modal titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

mono.usage: Email content previews, code snippets, data metrics, analysis scores.

rules: Hero section must use 'Control Room' aesthetic (dashboard preview).

dashboard.card_style: Flat, 1px border (zinc-800), no shadow, sharp or sm rounded corners.
dashboard.density: High. Use compact tables and lists.

buttons.primary: h-10 px-6 rounded-md bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: h-10 px-6 rounded-md border border-zinc-700 bg-transparent hover:bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-100 transition-all

cards.default: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800 rounded-xl p-6 backdrop-blur-sm

inputs.default: bg-zinc-950/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-indigo-500 rounded-md h-10

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines where possible. Use tooltips for details.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay on the background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.glows: Use radial gradients behind key elements (Hero image, CTA) to create depth.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for high-value cards (pricing, key features).
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

placeholders.logo: Use text 'ColdIQ' with Manrope font, weight 800, tracking-tighter.
placeholders.chart_placeholder: Use a Recharts component with mock data instead of an image.

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: The project uses .jsx files. Do NOT create .tsx files.
CRITICAL: Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it in index.css.
CRITICAL: Implement the 'Dark Mode' class strategy in tailwind.config.js (already present, ensure it's used).
STEP 1: Update index.css with the new font imports and color variables defined in 'colors' section.
STEP 2: Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar/Topbar structure for the dashboard.
STEP 3: Build the 'Email Analyzer' core component using a split-screen layout (Input Left, Analysis Right).
STEP 4: Use 'framer-motion' for subtle entrance animations on the dashboard cards.
STEP 5: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a main hero title.
Avoid 'Inter' font for headings. Use Manrope.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (e.g., p-8 instead of p-4).
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds. Use #09090b.
All toasts must use the 'sonner' library.
